body: Even in a world filled with the powers of the divine, you have decided to follow reason, put your faith in the potential of mortals, or otherwise invest in the ways of the material world instead of embracing the teachings of deities. You gain access to the Tireless Logic social trait.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Background Generator/Step 3-Moral Conflicts/Relationships/and Drawbacks/Crime and Punishment/Deity and Religious Philosophy/No Deity
name: No Deity
